en.description: Arcane Pistoleer is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on killing an enemy with a headshot from a secondary weapon to increase ammo efficiency for a short time.

ru.description: Arcane Pistoleer is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on killing an enemy with a headshot from a secondary weapon to increase ammo efficiency for a short time.

ko.description: Arcane Pistoleer is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on killing an enemy with a headshot from a secondary weapon to increase ammo efficiency for a short time.
